java/liquibase/change/AddAutoIncrementChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.*;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00022 public class AddAutoIncrementChange extends AbstractChange {
00023 
00024     private String schemaName;
00025     private String tableName;
00026     private String columnName;
00027     private String columnDataType;
00028 
00029     public AddAutoIncrementChange() {
00030         super("addAutoIncrement", "Set Column as Auto-Increment");
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getSchemaName() {
00034         return schemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00038         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getTableName() {
00042         return tableName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00046         this.tableName = tableName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getColumnName() {
00050         return columnName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00054         this.columnName = columnName;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getColumnDataType() {
00058         return columnDataType;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00062         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00066         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00067         if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00068             String sequenceName = (getTableName()+"_"+getColumnName()+"_seq").toLowerCase();
00069             return new SqlStatement[]{
00070                     new CreateSequenceStatement(schemaName, sequenceName),
00071                     new SetNullableStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName(), null, false),
00072                     new AddDefaultValueStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName(), sequenceName),
00073             };
00074         } else {
00075             return new SqlStatement[] { new AddAutoIncrementStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName(), getColumnDataType())};
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00080         return "Auto-increment added to "+getTableName()+"."+getColumnName();
00081     }
00082 
00083     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00084         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("addAutoIncrement");
00085         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00086         node.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00087         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00088             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00089         }
00090         if (getColumnDataType() != null) {
00091             node.setAttribute("columnDataType", getColumnDataType());
00092         }
00093 
00094         return node;
00095     }
00096 
00097     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00098         Column column = new Column();
00099 
00100         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00101         column.setTable(table);
00102 
00103         column.setName(columnName);
00104 
00105         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00106 
00107     }
00108     
00109 }
